author: andreasmyth
msg: Specify handler chain for handler demo via configuration.
The demo's README and the demo configuration files contain a quick introduction into how to use the Spring XML format for that purpose.

author: andreasmyth
msg: Ade's contributions to the samples build system - with locations of generated source and class files restored.
celtix.jar shipped in lib directory to use different class path than celtix.jar in build/lib.

author: andreasmyth
msg: Added first (primitive) version of a stylesheet to generate documentation from configuration metadata.

author: ajaypaibir
msg: Added support for SOAP Header parts mapped to method parameters via the SOAPHandler. Removed exisiting soap header related code from SOAPBindingImpl. Added unit tests.

author: andreasmyth
msg: Again disabled the second test in test case HTTPServerTransportGroup.
The fact that the problems with the second server transport occur only on
some machines suggests there are stil thread related issues.
As before, these have nothing do to with using executor supplied threads -
see commented lines in first test.
